description: Avoid words that are subjective and cannot be measured.
correction_strategy: Replace the vague adjective with a specific numeric metric or SLA reference.

description: Passive voice obscures who or what is performing the action.
good_examples: The System shall save the data.
The Backend Service shall generate the report.
correction_strategy: Identify the actor (System, User, Module) and make them the subject of the sentence.
Define the constraint in verifiable terms (e.g., number of clicks, compliance with a standard).

description: Avoid combining multiple requirements into one sentence using 'and' or 'or'.
bad_examples: The system shall save the user profile and send a confirmation email.
good_examples: The system shall save the user profile.
The system shall send a confirmation email.
correction_strategy: Split the sentence into two separate atomic requirements.
